# Tender Announcement

## Background Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of a high resolution sector field inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (SF-ICP-MS) with a desolvating nebulizer for the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC).

## Contract Details

*   Solicitation Number: WS4340143250
*   Publication Date: 2023-12-21
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-05T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-15
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End-User Entity: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Equipment Requirements

A high resolution sector field inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (SF-ICP-MS) with a desolvating nebulizer is required to enhance the CNSC’s capabilities and provide more accurate results for safeguards compliance, national nuclear forensic library (NNFL) maintenance, and nuclear forensic (NF) sample analysis.

## Trade Agreements and Conditions

This tender is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

## Bid Submission

Please submit your bid electronically on the Ariba Discovery website.

## Amendment to Closing Time

The original closing time has been revised to 2024-01-05T14:00:00.

## Contact Information

Inquiries can be directed to Adriana Gonzalez (SPAC/PSPC) at adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
